sockets.description: Make sure to enable Local API within the HomeWizard App for the Energy Sockets you want to use. Read more: https://homewizard-energy-api.readthedocs.io/getting-started.html#enabling-the-api

name.title: A name to identify the Energy Socket
name.description: This is used internally. You can change this name when you add the Energy Socket to HomeKit.

ip.title: Local IP Address
ip.description: Make sure to enable a fixed IP address for this Energy Socket at your router. Otherwise the IP address might change and the Energy Socket will not be found.
